actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the payment of retirement benefits to officers and employees of the U.S. Postal Service, other than retirement benefits payable under title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Prohibits the Postal Service from paying, or from entering into any employment contract, collective-bargaining agreement, or other similar agreement, to pay, any officer or employee of the Postal Service, or any spouse of such officer or employee, any annuity, retired pay, pension, or any other periodic or other payment of a similar nature which is based on the death or separation of any such officer or employee from the Postal Service. Provides that the provisions of this Act shall not apply with respect to payment under any employment contract, collective-bargaining agreement, or other similar agreement, entered into before the date of the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the payment of retirement benefits to officers and employees of the U.S. Postal Service, other than retirement benefits payable under title 5, United States Code.
